title: Luxury 1 bed in Lakeshore East with the balcony + W/D In-Unit + Pool
posting_body:
['Luxury Lakeshore East Living', 'Reference #476
    Apartment Amenities
  • Open Floor Plans with floor-to-ceiling windows
  • Expansive glass paneled balconies with panoramic views
  • Quartz Countertops
  • GE Clean Steel Energy Star appliances
  • Sleek baths with ceramic tile and mosaic accents
  • Oversized cultured marble vanities
  • ', 'In-home laundry with full size washer & dryer
  • Spacious closets, including walk-ins
  • Window treatments
  • Plank Flooring
  • Track Lighting
  • ', 'Pet Friendly
    Community Amenities
  • Heated outdoor lap pool
  • Landscaped garden and deck
  • Indoor spa lounge with hot tub
  • Sauna and steam rooms
  • World-class fitness center with Cybex equipment
  • Tech center with PC and MAC stations
  • Lounge areas with expansive day beds
  • Fire pit with lounge seating and grilling stations
  • Skygarden lounge with catering kitchen
  • Private in-building dog run and washing station
  • 100% smoke-free environment
  • Parking garage
  • ', 'On-Site Maintenance/Management
  • Package drop-off and pick-up
  • Tidespin Cleaning
', 'My service is 100% free!', 'Photos are examples meant to reflect finishes.', 'Actual unit may vary based on floor plan and availability.', 'Availability and pricing is real-time, can change daily, and varies by lease term.', 'Equal housing opportunity.', '

Call/Text Maria Ashurova at 773-526-0611

Leasing Agent, Michael Scavo Group - Compass

*I work with the largest database of apartment and condo rentals in the city; call me today for help with your search!*

']
